raw_body: SANDERATNE – AMAL,​ beloved husband of Ayoma,​ loving father of Eran,​ son of Nimal and Indira,​ son-in-law of Premasiri and Violet Abeysuriya,​ brother-in-law of Milanga and Amal,​ expired. Cortege leaves “The Restpect Home” by Jayaratne’s at 3.00 p.m. on Tuesday,​ 25th July 2023 for Burial at the General Cemetery,​ Borella.045793
